summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 264 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 979 m), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), inside temperature (up 1.6°C), and outside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 263.9m lower than yesterday, 93.1m lower than the past week, 978.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 745m minimum and 3580m maximum, with an average of 1722.5m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1815.6m and 2700m.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Some rain can be expected, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. Weather could become unsettled.
